# Problem 1

Importing libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


## Part 1. First we will read and clean the pols-month.csv data.

```{r}

pols_df = 
  read.csv("./fivethirtyeight_datasets/pols-month.csv") |>
  janitor::clean_names() |>
  separate(mon, c("year", "month", "day"), convert = TRUE) |>
  mutate(
    month = case_when(
      month == 1 ~ "January",
      month == 2 ~ "February",
      month == 3 ~ "March",
      month == 4 ~ "April",
      month == 5 ~ "May",
      month == 6 ~ "June",
      month == 7 ~ "July",
      month == 8 ~ "August",
      month == 9 ~ "September",
      month == 10 ~ "October",
      month == 11 ~ "November",
      month == 12 ~ "December"
    )
  ) |>
  mutate(
    president = case_when(
      prez_dem == 1 ~ "dem",
      prez_gop == 1 ~ "gop"
    )
  )
```
